FuncDef:
The transmission-alarm holdup-timer command enables the filtering function for the delay clearance alarms, and set a filtering interval.
The undo transmission-alarm holdup-timer command recovers the preceding function.
By default, the preceding function is enabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the filtering time when the alarm clearance signal is delayed.
The value is an integer that ranges from 200-3600000 to milliseconds. The default value is 300 ms.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The transmission-alarm holdup-timer command can be used to enable alarm clearance filtering and set a filtering interval.
Prerequisites
Transmission alarm customization has been enabled on an interface.
Precautions
The value of the holdup-time parameter varies with the flapping frequency of interfaces.
